attributes.action: Aromatherapy massage and Reflexology for reducing pain and Depression.
attributes.additional_details:
Aromatherapy massage and reflexology has been found to soothe pain, reduce stress levels while improving mood, mobility, and sleep patterns. 
These treatments are also beneficial to promote self-care and healthy aging
attributes.background: Aromatherapy massage and reflexology treatments can be given to people who have been prescribed medication, without having harmful side effects.

rejection.details:
Patient care, including whether to prescribe complementary or alternative medicines or therapies, is a matter for individual clinicians and the NHS, not the Government or House or House of Commons.

You can read more about the NHS's approach to complementary and alternative medicine here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/complementary-and-alternative-medicine/
